metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12212 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: When FreeImage 3.18.0 reads a special JXR file, the StreamCalcIFDSizefunction of JXRMeta.c repeatedly calls itself due to improper processing ofthe file, eventually causing stack exhaustion. An attacker can achieve aremote denial of service attack by sending a specially constructed file.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
